Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 17th overall pick, by Arizona in 2008...
Injured on 5/27/2008 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Had first career hit on 5/15/2011, off Cliff Lee (COL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/27/2011, off Wilfredo Ledezma (HOU)...
Injured on 7/2/2012 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/6/2013, hitting .591 with 1 HR, 8 RBI...
Traded from Arizona to New York (N) on 2/4/2014 (Going to ARI: RF D. Hood, P J. Cano. Going to NYN: P F. Salas, 1B B. Wallace)...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Washington on 5/4/2014...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/2014, hitting .480 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Washington on 6/15/2016...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against San Diego on 6/10/2017...
Injured on 8/13/2017 with a Inflamed Thigh Muscle, out for 2 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Colorado on 6/8/2019...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 2/3/2020 to a 3-year deal worth $4,000,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 2/12/2023 to a 3-year deal worth $560,000 per year...
Released by Toronto on 4/1/2024...
